get_files[source]

get_files(path:Path, skip:Union[str, List[str]]=None)

file_detail[source]

file_detail(path:Path, skip:Union[str, List[str]]=None)

Get detailed file information from a directory

file_detail("../../../Downloads/apiGateway-js-sdk")
